channel.title: CVE Feed for Ultimate Member -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ultimate Member -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-0587|2024-08-05T03:28:11.175Z -- ultimate%20member -- ultimate%20member
item.description: Unrestricted file upload vulnerability in Ultimate Member plugin prior to version 2.0.4 for WordPress allows remote authenticated users to upload arbitrary image files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0585|2024-08-05T03:28:11.441Z -- ultimate%20member -- ultimate%20member
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Ultimate Member plugin prior to version 2.0.4 for WordPress allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0588|2024-08-05T03:28:11.133Z -- ultimate%20member -- ultimate%20member
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in the AJAX function of Ultimate Member plugin prior to version 2.0.4 for WordPress allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0590|2024-08-05T03:28:11.126Z -- ultimate%20member -- ultimate%20member
item.description: Ultimate Member plugin prior to version 2.0.4 for WordPress allows remote authenticated attackers to bypass access restriction to modify the other users profiles via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0586|2024-08-05T03:28:11.235Z -- ultimate%20member -- ultimate%20member
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in the shortcodes function of Ultimate Member plugin prior to version 2.0.4 for WordPress allows remote authenticated attackers to read arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0589|2024-08-05T03:28:11.163Z -- ultimate%20member -- ultimate%20member
item.description: Ultimate Member plugin prior to version 2.0.4 for WordPress allows remote authenticated attackers to bypass access restriction to add a new form in the 'Forms' page via unspecified vectors.
